benchmark_details.name: CHART QAP RO (Chart Question Answering for Real-World Objects)
benchmark_details.overview: CHART QAP RO is a new benchmark for Chart Question Answering that includes 1,341 charts from 157 diverse sources, featuring 1,948 questions across various types, including factoid, multiple-choice, conversational, hypothetical, and unanswerable questions, designed to assess real-world challenges in chart understanding.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a diverse and challenging benchmark for evaluating the capabilities of vision-language models in chart reasoning.

data.source: Collected from various platforms including Pew Research Center, Tableau, OWID, etc.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on exact match criteria for fact-checked and multiple-choice answers, with relaxed correctness for numeric answers.
methodology.interpretation: Performance evaluated against state-of-the-art models to reveal substantial performance drops compared to previous benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Experiment run across 21 models with comparisons to determine benchmark effectiveness.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All images sourced from publicly available platforms and reviewed for harmful content.
